title: The vvoman hater As it hath beene lately acted by the Children of Paules.
author: Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.
publisher: Printed [by Robert Raworth], and are to be sold by Iohn Hodgets in Paules Church-yard,
notes: By Francis Beaumont and John Fletcher.
A variant of the edition with printer's initials "R.R." [i.e. Robert Raworth] in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Dyce Library, Victoria and Albert Museum.
